title: Overcontrol and rebound effect
content:
Overcontrol and rebound effect
I discovered a problem: after planning my daily tasks and following the schedule for a while, I often suddenly give up, similar to binge eating during a diet.
[我发现一个问题，当我规划每天要做哪些事情并按照规划执行一段时间后，很容易出现突然自暴自弃，就像节食减脂过程中容易暴饮暴食的情况。]
I sent this issue to DeepSeek, and it identified it as a case of overcontrol and rebound effect.
[我将这个问题发给 DeepSeek，它说这是一种过度控制与反弹效应。]
According to AI's diagnosis, this is caused by psychological energy depletion.
[结合 AI 的诊断，这是由于心理能量耗尽导致的。]
Next, I will adjust my plan based on AI's suggestions to make it more scientific and better suited to myself.
[接下来会结合 AI 给的意见调整计划，使其更科学更适合自己。]

sentences.text: I discovered a problem: after planning my daily tasks and following the schedule for a while, I often suddenly give up, similar to binge eating during a diet.
我发现一个问题，当我规划每天要做哪些事情并按照规划执行一段时间后，很容易出现突然自暴自弃，就像节食减脂过程中容易暴饮暴食的情况。
I sent this issue to DeepSeek, and it identified it as a case of overcontrol and rebound effect.
我将这个问题发给 DeepSeek，它说这是一种过度控制与反弹效应。
According to AI's diagnosis, this is caused by psychological energy depletion.
结合 AI 的诊断，这是由于心理能量耗尽导致的。
Next, I will adjust my plan based on AI's suggestions to make it more scientific and better suited to myself.
接下来会结合 AI 给的意见调整计划，使其更科学更适合自己。
